thread.section_title: FloraQueen opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre FloraQueen | www.floraqueen.com
thread.title: notlaw

author: notlaw
title: notlaw
text: I ordered flowers (and paid extra to have them delivered at weekend to France on Mothers day). I received a message to say they had been delivered so was happy. Rang Mum and asked if she was happy with the flowers only to be informed they had not arrived and have still not arrived as of today (Tuesday). I don't know whether to be upset or angry! Quite unbelievable that I had a message saying they had been delivered when this is clearly not the case.Mothers Day was ruined for both of us!
